review.title: “Awesome Place to work”
review.pros: Pros – Awesome bosses, good pay, good experience, very laid back about time off for valid reasons, plenty of water breaks and great co-workers
review.cons: Cons – Hard work in the sun, but it's fair and well-compensated. Some annoying clients that you will deal with but they're all tolerable
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Don't really have any advice to offer management that they don't already know. Bosses are pretty smart and experienced in the field.
